post.author: 김승엽
post.content:
The company (CGI GROUP INC.) I'm working for is desperately looking for a candidate who knows RPGIV on AS/400 as well as Unix with C or C++ programming experience.
If you know Java that will be nice, too.

Please send me your resume as soon as possible at sheon_kim@yahoo.com
.
post.title: Looking for AS/400 P/A who are also familiar with Unix and C/C++
